title: Ethical Hacking and cyber security
overview: The workshop helps the students to know about Ethical Hacking and Information security thereby giving them knowledge about Reading the Hacker’s mind and Understanding the hacking psychology and methodology and lots more with proper demonstrations and practical work. The workshop would be conducted by faculty having International Level Expertise in the field of Information Security and Ethical Hacking.
topics: In case of any dispute, management’s decision will be final.
Participants have to report to the venue 10 minutes before the event starts.
Organizers will have the authority to change the rules under certain conditions.
The participation fee for a team of 2-3 participants is Rs 180.
Winners will be rewarded with attractive prizes.
Participation certificates will be given to every participant.

title: Game Development with AR/VR
overview: Participants will be provided with a laser source and mirrors. Students are not allowed to bring anything along with them, everything will be provided by the management.
topics: A look at different Augmented Reality Tools
Requirements for working with AR platform
Importing the 3D Game Objects inside the Game
Readjusting the position, shape and rotation of GameObjects
Developing and writing scripts for different GameObjects
Attaching Scripts to GameObjects and playing the Game.
Installation & Setting up a Vuforia sdk
Taking a perfect image for Augmented Reality development
Modifying the image for better purpose
How to choose Backgrounds for VR video.
How to set Render for VR.
How to convert an mp4 into a VR mp4.
How to create and shoot video in VR.
Participation certificate will be given to every participant.

overview: Participants will be provided with a laser source and mirrors. Students are not allowed to bring anything along with them, everything will be provided by the management.
topics: Participants must compulsorily come with their laptops.

title: Cloud Computing
overview: The Cloud Computing Workshop will make participants adapt to various cloud computing architectures. Live projects will help participants keep up with all technologies, tools, and methodologies required to understand and work on cloud computing principles used in the IT industry.
topics: Understanding of Cloud Computing Technology, aspects its models.
Understanding of virtualization and its role with Cloud Computing.
Creating Virtual Machines using Vmware and VirtualBox.
Introduction and understanding of Amazon Cloud Service, EC2, zones and region.
Creating an account on Amazon, creating a billing alarm EC2 machine.
Module 4:Exploring Cloud Computing as a Service
Understanding Cloud Computing model of services.
Connection of EC2 using different options, deploy Windows server and wordpress instance using graphical and run live website. Connect instance using CLI.
S3, its version, different price of using S3 in different zones, security version of S3
S3, Bucket, Upload data and make it public, S3 versioning, share s3 across different account, Cross Region Replication in S3
Cloud Watch and Trail for EC2, Access EC2 using CLI and access S3 from EC2, credential file, IAM role with EC2, create BootStrap Script and Access
Participants must compulsorily come with their laptops.
Participation certificate will be given to every participant.

title: Internet Of Things (IoT)
overview: Internet of Things is a new revolution of the Internet. A world where the real, digital, and the virtual are converging to create smart environments that make energy, transport, cities, and many other areas more intelligent. A device that becomes a smart device is called IoT.
topics: Different types of OS based on the situation and platform
Different types of IoT cloud platforms
BLOCKCHAIN AND CYBER SECURITY IN IOT
Participants must compulsorily come with their laptops.
Participation certificate will be given to every participant.

title: Photography
overview: Participants will be provided with a laser source and mirrors. Students are not allowed to bring anything along with them, everything will be provided by the management.
topics: What is the difference between Mirrorless and Digital Camera
How to Select a Digital Camera and Lenses?
Practical Sessions and many more topics to be covered.
The participation fee for individual participation is Rs 200.
